snippet: Dennis Doyle has decided to combine his passions for writing, traveling and the Knicks by attending all of the team’s 82 games this season. But what about all the losing?
abstract: Dennis Doyle of Queens, a New York Knicks fan since childhood, is giving up his law career to hit the road with his favorite team; he plans to attend all of team's 82 games, saying he sees it as quest for self-discovery and chance to explore his passion for travel and writing.
lead_paragraph: Dennis Doyle has decided to combine his passions for writing, traveling and the Knicks by attending all of the team’s 82 games this season. But what about all the losing?

headline.main: Living Out Knicks Dream, Complete With Nightmares
headline.print_headline: Living Out Knicks Dream, Complete With Nightmares
